author: Megan Armstrong
title: Ben Roethlisberger Helps Pittsburgh Restaurant with 'Significant' Contribution
description: Big  Ben Roethlisberger  made a big contribution to Juliano's Italian Restaurant in Robinson, Pennsylvania—located about an hour away from where the  Pittsburgh Steelers  play at Heinz Field...
content:
Adam Hunger/Associated Press
Big Ben Roethlisberger made a big contribution to Juliano's Italian Restaurant in Robinson, Pennsylvanialocated about an hour away from where the Pittsburgh Steelers play at Heinz Field.
